files.suspensions.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=2

[BASIC]
WHEELBASE=2.67						; Wheelbase distance in meters
CG_LOCATION=0.560
[ARB]
FRONT=30000									; Front antiroll bar stiffness. in Nm
REAR=5000								; Rear antiroll bar stiffness. in Nm

[FRONT]
TYPE=DWB
BASEY=-0.10									; Distance of CG from the center of the wheel in meters. Front Wheel Radius+BASEY=front CoG. Actual CG height =(FWR+FBasey)+(RWR+Rbasey))/CG_LOCATION%
TRACK=1.625									; Track width in meters (from pivot 3D placement of the 3d model of a wheel)
ROD_LENGTH=0.02								; push rod length in meters. positive raises ride height, negative lowers ride height.
HUB_MASS=54									; Front sprung mass
RIM_OFFSET=0.00
WBCAR_TOP_FRONT=0.386, 0.408, 0.096			; Top front car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_TOP_REAR=0.386, 0.408, -0.12			; Top rear car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_BOTTOM_FRONT=0.455, -0.095, 0.008		; Bottom front car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_BOTTOM_REAR=0.44, -0.095, -0.285		; Bottom rear car side wishbone attach point
WBTYRE_TOP=0.1971, 0.441, -0.01336	 	    ; Top tyre side wishbone attach point
WBTYRE_BOTTOM=0.090, -0.11, 0.03			; Bottom tyre side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_STEER=0.455, -0.095, -0.08			; Steering rod car side attach point
WBTYRE_STEER=0.0819, -0.11, -0.08			; Steering rod tyre side attach point
TOE_OUT=-0.00040								; Toe-out expressed as the length of the steering arm in meters
STATIC_CAMBER=-4.6							; Static Camber in degrees. Actual camber relative to suspension geometry and movement, check values in game
SPRING_RATE=51000							; Wheel rate stiffness in Nm. Do not use spring value but calculate wheel rate
PROGRESSIVE_SPRING_RATE=0					; progressive spring rate in N/m/m
BUMP_STOP_RATE=50000						; bump stop spring rate
BUMPSTOP_UP=0.13							; meters to upper bumpstop from the 0 design of the suspension
BUMPSTOP_DN=0.06							; meters to bottom bumpstop from the 0 design of the suspension
PACKER_RANGE=0.13							; Total suspension movement range, before hitting packers
DAMP_BUMP=3000									; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in slow speed compression
DAMP_FAST_BUMP=1600							; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in fast speed compression
DAMP_FAST_BUMPTHRESHOLD=0.10					; Damper bump slow/fast threshold in seconds
DAMP_REBOUND=8900								; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in slow speed rebound
DAMP_FAST_REBOUND=4700							; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in fast speed rebound
DAMP_FAST_REBOUNDTHRESHOLD=0.10				; Damper rebound slow/fast threshold in seconds

[REAR]
TYPE=DWB
BASEY=-0.10									; Distance of CG from the center of the wheel in meters. Rear Wheel Radius+BASEY=Rear CoG  Actual CG height =(FWR+FBasey)+(RWR+Rbasey))/CG_LOCATION%
TRACK=1.535
ROD_LENGTH=0.02						
HUB_MASS=42
RIM_OFFSET=0.00
WBCAR_TOP_FRONT=0.33, 0.11, 0.02
WBCAR_TOP_REAR=0.33, 0.11, -0.14
WBCAR_BOTTOM_FRONT=0.32, -0.08, 0.365
WBCAR_BOTTOM_REAR=0.48, -0.1, -0.12
WBTYRE_TOP=0.14, 0.13, 0.0
WBTYRE_BOTTOM=0.125, -0.09, -0.09
WBCAR_STEER=0.42, -0.08, 0.09
WBTYRE_STEER=0.125, -0.072, 0.06

STATIC_CAMBER=0.9

PROGRESSIVE_SPRING_RATE=0.95
BUMP_STOP_RATE=91500

BUMPSTOP_DN=0.01

DAMP_FAST_BUMPTHRESHOLD=0.06					
DAMP_REBOUND=4700					
DAMP_FAST_REBOUND=2700
DAMP_FAST_REBOUNDTHRESHOLD=0.08


[GRAPHICS_OFFSETS]
WHEEL_LF=-0.04						;Left front graphical offset of the wheel positioning in the x axis (width). + is left - is right movement
SUSP_LF=-0.04						;Left front graphical offset of the suspension positioning in the x axis (width). + is left - is right movement
WHEEL_RF=0.04				; Right front as above

WHEEL_RR=0.035							; Right rear as above

[DAMAGE]

MINUMUM VELOCITY TO START TAKING DAMAGE

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.41					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

ROLLING_RESISTANCE_1=0.00340					; rolling resistance velocity (squared) component

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.23					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

[HEADER]
VERSION=1

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.13					; engine inertia
LIMITER=7800					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=17					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=100		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[MAP]
DEFAULT = 1 ; default map index
MAP_0 = engine_map0.lut ; rpm | torque_multiplier
MAP_1 = engine_map1.lut ; can have as many as desired
MAP_2 = engine_map2.lut ;

[COAST_REF]
RPM=7700						; rev number reference
TORQUE=95						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.988					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=0.100				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.100				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.100		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=2.75					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]

files.drivetrain.ini:

; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count

GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774

POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable

MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]

POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas

[BASIC]
WHEELBASE=2.48						; Wheelbase distance in meters
CG_LOCATION=0.560
[ARB]
FRONT=30000									; Front antiroll bar stiffness. in Nm
REAR=5000								; Rear antiroll bar stiffness. in Nm

[FRONT]
TYPE=DWB
BASEY=-0.10									; Distance of CG from the center of the wheel in meters. Front Wheel Radius+BASEY=front CoG. Actual CG height =(FWR+FBasey)+(RWR+Rbasey))/CG_LOCATION%
TRACK=1.625									; Track width in meters (from pivot 3D placement of the 3d model of a wheel)
ROD_LENGTH=0.02								; push rod length in meters. positive raises ride height, negative lowers ride height.
HUB_MASS=54									; Front sprung mass
RIM_OFFSET=0.00
WBCAR_TOP_FRONT=0.386, 0.408, 0.096			; Top front car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_TOP_REAR=0.386, 0.408, -0.12			; Top rear car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_BOTTOM_FRONT=0.455, -0.095, 0.008		; Bottom front car side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_BOTTOM_REAR=0.44, -0.095, -0.285		; Bottom rear car side wishbone attach point
WBTYRE_TOP=0.1971, 0.441, -0.01336	 	    ; Top tyre side wishbone attach point
WBTYRE_BOTTOM=0.090, -0.11, 0.03			; Bottom tyre side wishbone attach point
WBCAR_STEER=0.455, -0.095, -0.08			; Steering rod car side attach point
WBTYRE_STEER=0.0819, -0.11, -0.08			; Steering rod tyre side attach point
TOE_OUT=-0.00040								; Toe-out expressed as the length of the steering arm in meters
STATIC_CAMBER=-4.6							; Static Camber in degrees. Actual camber relative to suspension geometry and movement, check values in game
SPRING_RATE=51000							; Wheel rate stiffness in Nm. Do not use spring value but calculate wheel rate
PROGRESSIVE_SPRING_RATE=0					; progressive spring rate in N/m/m
BUMP_STOP_RATE=50000						; bump stop spring rate
BUMPSTOP_UP=0.13							; meters to upper bumpstop from the 0 design of the suspension
BUMPSTOP_DN=0.06							; meters to bottom bumpstop from the 0 design of the suspension
PACKER_RANGE=0.13							; Total suspension movement range, before hitting packers
DAMP_BUMP=3000									; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in slow speed compression
DAMP_FAST_BUMP=1600							; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in fast speed compression
DAMP_FAST_BUMPTHRESHOLD=0.10					; Damper bump slow/fast threshold in seconds
DAMP_REBOUND=8900								; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in slow speed rebound
DAMP_FAST_REBOUND=4700							; Damper wheel rate stiffness in N sec/m in fast speed rebound
DAMP_FAST_REBOUNDTHRESHOLD=0.10				; Damper rebound slow/fast threshold in seconds

[REAR]
TYPE=DWB
BASEY=-0.10									; Distance of CG from the center of the wheel in meters. Rear Wheel Radius+BASEY=Rear CoG  Actual CG height =(FWR+FBasey)+(RWR+Rbasey))/CG_LOCATION%
TRACK=1.535
ROD_LENGTH=0.02						
HUB_MASS=42
RIM_OFFSET=0.00
WBCAR_TOP_FRONT=0.33, 0.11, 0.02
WBCAR_TOP_REAR=0.33, 0.11, -0.14
WBCAR_BOTTOM_FRONT=0.32, -0.08, 0.365
WBCAR_BOTTOM_REAR=0.48, -0.1, -0.12
WBTYRE_TOP=0.14, 0.13, 0.0
WBTYRE_BOTTOM=0.125, -0.09, -0.09
WBCAR_STEER=0.42, -0.08, 0.09
WBTYRE_STEER=0.125, -0.072, 0.06
TOE_OUT=-0.0002
STATIC_CAMBER=0.8
SPRING_RATE=50000
PROGRESSIVE_SPRING_RATE=0.95
BUMP_STOP_RATE=92500
BUMPSTOP_UP=0.06						
BUMPSTOP_DN=0.01
PACKER_RANGE=0.15						
DAMP_BUMP=4700	
DAMP_FAST_BUMP=1000	
DAMP_FAST_BUMPTHRESHOLD=0.06					
DAMP_REBOUND=5500					
DAMP_FAST_REBOUND=3500
DAMP_FAST_REBOUNDTHRESHOLD=0.08


[GRAPHICS_OFFSETS]
WHEEL_LF=-0.035						;Left front graphical offset of the wheel positioning in the x axis (width). + is left - is right movement
SUSP_LF=-0.015						;Left front graphical offset of the suspension positioning in the x axis (width). + is left - is right movement
WHEEL_RF=0.035				; Right front as above
SUSP_RF=0.015									; Right front as above
WHEEL_LR=0.03				; Left rear as above
SUSP_LR=-0.03								; Left rear as above
WHEEL_RR=-0.03							; Right rear as above
SUSP_RR=0.03								; Right rear as above

[DAMAGE]

MIN_VELOCITY=40				;
MINUMUM VELOCITY TO START TAKING DAMAGE
GAIN=0.0004					;
AMOUNT OF STEER ROD DEFLECTION FOR IMPACT KMH
MAX_DAMAGE=0.05			;
MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF STEER ROD DEFLECTION ALLOWED
DEBUG_LOG=1					;
ACTIVATES DAMAGE DEBUG IN THE LOG

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.23					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.41					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.75					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

GEAR_2=1.917

GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.03					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas

[HEADER]
VERSION=1

[ENGINE_DATA]

INERTIA=0.13					; engine inertia
LIMITER=7900					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=33					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=100		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[MAP]
DEFAULT = 1 ; default map index
MAP_0 = engine_map0.lut ; rpm | torque_multiplier
MAP_1 = engine_map1.lut ; can have as many as desired
MAP_2 = engine_map2.lut ;

[COAST_REF]
RPM=7900						; rev number reference
TORQUE=95						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.984					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=0.110				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.110				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.110		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3800				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=2.75					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

GEAR_2=1.917

GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.63					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=80							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=70								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=50								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=5									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.065	
GEAR_5=0.774
FINAL=4.23					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=85							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=65								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=55								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.engine.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.13					; engine inertia
LIMITER=7800					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=17					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=100		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[MAP]
DEFAULT = 1 ; default map index
MAP_0 = engine_map0.lut ; rpm | torque_multiplier
MAP_1 = engine_map1.lut ; can have as many as desired
MAP_2 = engine_map2.lut ;

[COAST_REF]
RPM=7700						; rev number reference
TORQUE=95						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.988					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=0.100				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=0.100				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=0.100		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=2.75					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure
